body: Mitsuha really lost it didn't she. She even offered to sell her body to help her rapist like i don't even know anymore.

they better not find each other. it's so unfair to the other guy. he should just give up with that shit and find him a gud girl. even if he find this girl so wt. it'll only be a loose whore. i really don't care about this bitch. it mostly her own fault.
Why this fucking artist think he can insult Vietnamese like that ? You think your country is superior than our ? So rule and stupid

i want to give a few correction. there is mistranslation at page 14. In the raw, japanese words that mitsuha told to that man is "自首しましょう"　meaning "let's surrender(to the police) . Mitsuha wants that man to take a responsibility for his crime.

and for those of you confused why mitsuha makes ahegao face at the latter page, is because that man put some heavy aphrodisiac illegal drugs into her drinks from chapter 7 that capable making human lost their mind. so it's NOT because his pure skill on bed (LOL).

Really wonder how this will end too. Maybe Taki finds the ribbon after sneaking out of the mixer, remembers Mitsuha and locates her? Then they either end up together or the even more despairing scenario would be Taki going with the mixer girl to the same hotel and start fucking her in a room right beside Mitsuha's and they never realize the other is there. Cue both of them giving up on finding each other and go their separate ways.
I have decided that I want to die
Love the art, but that guy should jump off a very high bridge.

2-8 was translated a while back in one bundle but the chapters are now individually uploaded. We are still waiting how 9 is gonna turn out for Mitsuha, not that we have any more hopes but yea, it's NTR, hope = shit in NTR-verse.
Some mentally ill hapa translated all eight of these with google just in time for Christmas
This is Christmas so many NTR I love it

Magic love so strong it takes a rape and drugs to fight against it. Well it doesnt help that the heroine is too stupid and nice for her own good.

If she still felt something for her rapist after drugging her, she should just accept her fate.
